Package com.databaseproject

Class Database

  • Object
    • Database
  • public class Database
extends Object
    This class creates a Database object and implements the CRUD functionalities that are necessary for a relational database. The methods that perform each of the CRUD tasks are listed below.

    CREATE

    • createDatabaseAndUser(String[] db1ConnectionString, String[] db2ConnectionString)
    • convertToTable(Connection connection, String tableName, String allFields)
    • createTable(Connection connection, String tableName, String columns)

    READ

    • selectByState(Connection connection, String state)
    • selectByState(Connection connection, String tableName, String state)
    • selectByDate(Connection connection, String date_user)
    • selectByDate(Connection connection, String tableName, String date_user)
    • selectByStateDate(Connection connection, String state, String date_user)
    • selectByStateDate(Connection connection, String tableName, String state, String date_user)

    UPDATE

    • alterUser(String db, String username, String password)
    • addRecords(Connection connection, String filename, String tableName)

    DELETE

    • dropTable(Connection connection, String tableName)
    • deleteOldRecords(Connection connection, String tableName, String specifiedDate)
    • deleteDatabaseAndUser(Connection conn, String dbName, String user)
    Version:
    2.0 This version introduces Java Servlets and JSP
    Author:
    Rachel Friedman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Database()
      Creates an empty database object with no set parameters
      Database​(String db, String username, String password)
      Creates a Database object with a specified database name, username and password

        username - the username
        password - the password

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        public Connection getConnection()
        Retrieves the database connection
        Returns:
        the database connection

      • createDatabaseAndUser

        public void createDatabaseAndUser​(String[] db1ConnectionString,
                                  String[] db2ConnectionString)
        Creates database with name specified. Creates user with user and password as specified. Grants user all privileges for newly created database.
        Parameters:
        db1ConnectionString - initial connection to default database
        db2ConnectionString - connection to new database. Includes database name, username and password.

      • alterUser

        public void alterUser​(String db,
                      String username,
                      String password)
        Alters password for specified user with given password
        Parameters:
        db - the initial database for creating this user
        username - the user whose password is to be changed
        password - the new password for the given user

      • connectToDatabase

        public Connection connectToDatabase​(String db,
                                    String username,
                                    String password)
        Connects to database db with specified username and password
        Parameters:
        db - the database to connect to
        username - the username to connect with
        password - the password to connect with
        Returns:
        the database connection

      • dropTable

        public static void dropTable​(Connection connection,
                             String tableName)
        Drops the specified table.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the current database
        tableName - the table to be dropped

      • convertToTable

        public void convertToTable​(Connection connection,
                           String tableName,
                           String allFields)
        Creates a table specified by tableName, using allFields from a csv file as columns
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the current database
        tableName - the name of the table to be created
        allFields - the column names and data types

      • createTable

        public void createTable​(Connection connection,
                        String tableName,
                        String columns)
                 throws SQLException
        Creates a table in this database with tableName as table and columns as specified.
        This method also adds an ID column as the primary key.
        This method also alters the column names.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the current database
        tableName - the name of the table to be created
        columns - the column names and data types
        Throws:
        SQLException - for database errors

      • createTable

        public void createTable​(Connection connection,
                        String importedTable,
                        String newTableName,
                        String columns)
                 throws SQLException
        Creates a table from an existing table in this database with tableName as table and columns as specified.
        This method also adds an ID column as the primary key.
        This method also alters the column names.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the current database
        importedTable - the name of the table of the import with the latest data
        newTableName - the name of the table to be created
        columns - the column names and data types
        Throws:
        SQLException - for database errors

      • createTableFromQuery

        public void createTableFromQuery​(Connection conn,
                                 String sql)
                          throws SQLException
        Creates a table in the database using the results of a query
        Parameters:
        conn - the database connection
        sql - the SQL SELECT statement
        Throws:
        SQLException - for database errors

      • createTableFromQuery

        public void createTableFromQuery​(Connection conn,
                                 String tableName,
                                 String sql)
        Creates a table in the database using the results of a query
        Parameters:
        conn - the database connection
        tableName - name of table to be created
        sql - the SQL SELECT statement

      • addRecords

        public void addRecords​(Connection connection,
                       String filename,
                       String tableName)
        Adds record to specified table by copying data from specified file.
        Parameters:
        connection - the database connection
        filename - the csv file from which to copy the data
        tableName - the name of the table to add the records to

      • addRecords

        public void addRecords​(PGConnection connection,
                       String filename,
                       String tableName)
        Adds record to specified table by copying data from specified file using a pgConnection. this type of connection is required for running the web based version from apache tomcat.
        Parameters:
        connection - the database PGConnection
        filename - the csv file from which to copy the data
        tableName - the name of the table to add the records to

      • deleteOldRecords

        public void deleteOldRecords​(Connection connection,
                             String tableName,
                             String specifiedDate)
        Deletes records from table tableName where date is before given date
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the database
        tableName - the table from which to delete the rows
        specifiedDate - specifies the date from which to delete all records. Records on this date are not deleted.

      • deleteRecordsAfter

        public void deleteRecordsAfter​(Connection connection,
                               String tableName,
                               String specifiedDate)
                        throws SQLException
        Deletes records from table tableName where date is after given date
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the database
        tableName - the table from which to delete the rows
        specifiedDate - specifies the date from which to delete all records. Records on this date are not deleted.
        Throws:
        SQLException - when a database error occurs

      • deleteDatabaseAndUser

        public void deleteDatabaseAndUser​(Connection conn,
                                  String dbName,
                                  String user)
        Deletes this session's database and user. This method is typically used to perform cleanup when exiting a program.
        Parameters:
        conn - the connection to the database
        dbName - the database to be deleted
        user - the user to be deleted

      • selectByStateNoOutput

        public void selectByStateNoOutput​(Connection connection,
                                  String state)
                           throws SQLException
        Performs a "select by state" query and returns positive cases, hospitalizations and deaths by joining three tables for a specific state, sorted by latest date first
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the database
        state - the specific state to fetch data for
        Throws:
        SQLException - when a database error occurs

      • selectByState

        public String selectByState​(Connection connection,
                            String state)
        Performs a "select by state" query and returns positive cases, hospitalizations and deaths by joining three tables for a specific state, sorted by latest date first
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the database
        state - the specific state to fetch data for
        Returns:
        the results of the query formatted in an html table

      • selectByState

        public String selectByState​(Connection connection,
                            String tableName,
                            String state)
        Performs a "select by state" query on table specified
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the database
        tableName - the table to be queried
        state - the specific state to fetch data for
        Returns:
        the results of the query formatted in an html table

      • selectByDate

        public String selectByDate​(Connection connection,
                           String date_user)
        Performs a "select by date" query and returns positive cases, hospitalizations and deaths by joining three tables for a specific date, sorted by decreasing positive cases
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the database
        date_user - the specific date to fetch data for
        Returns:
        the results of the query formatted in an html table

      • selectByDate

        public String selectByDate​(Connection connection,
                           String tableName,
                           String date_user)
        Performs a "select by date" query on table specified
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the database
        tableName - the table to be queried
        date_user - the specific date to fetch data for
        Returns:
        the results of the query formatted in an html table

      • selectByStateDate

        public String selectByStateDate​(Connection connection,
                                String tableName,
                                String state,
                                String date_user)
        Performs a "select by state and by date" query on table specified
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the database
        tableName - the table to be queried
        state - the specific state to fetch data for
        date_user - the specific date to fetch data for
        Returns:
        the results of the query formatted in an html table

      • selectByStateDate

        public String selectByStateDate​(Connection connection,
                                String state,
                                String date_user)
        Performs a "select by state and date" query and returns positive cases, hospitalizations and deaths by joining three tables for a specific state on a specific date
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the database
        state - the specific state to fetch data for
        date_user - the specific date to fetch data for
        Returns:
        the results of the query formatted in an html table

      • createListOfStates

        public HashMap<String,​String> createListOfStates()
        Creates a HashMap of the full name of the abbreviation of each state.
        This is used when checking to see if valid state was entered. This is also used when spelling out full name of state in place of abbreviation.
        Returns:
        a Hashmap of the abbreviations and full names of each of the 50 states and 6 territories.
